topItems.title: How does REYNOR get ahead EVERY SINGLE ZvT?

value.title: Learn Starcraft - Protoss Beginner Guide #1 (Updated Patch 4.0 FREE TO PLAY)
value.excerpt: How to command the incredibly strong forces of the protoss and cover weaknesses against the other inferior races. Updated for patch 4.0! This guide is not intended for COMPLETELY new players, but those who have played several games/campaign missions and grasp the very basics.

value.title: Learn Starcraft 2: Terran Build Order - EASY & SAFE [Starcraft 2 2020]
value.excerpt: In today's guide/lesson we're looking at how to execute a terran vs terran (tvt) build order. Was supposed to be just the opening but I got a little carried away so you're getting 19 minutes of raw TvT information. Get out your notepads ;)  #BuildOrder #TerranVsTerran #TvT Terran vs Terran(TvT) Build
